name: Ability Capsule
description: Changes one of a Pokémon’s Abilities to the user’s choice within the same slot.

name: Absorb Bulb
description: An energy-storing shoot. Used up if the holder is hit by a Water Move to Boost SATK by +5.

name: Adrenaline Orb
description: Used up when the holder is affected by Intimidate, Startle, or Chill to Boost SPE by +5. Can be used as an item to make wild Pokémon call for help.

name: Air Balloon
description: The holder floats in the air (Immune to Ground, terrain, and entry hazards) until damaged by a Move, which pops the Air Balloon.

name: Antidote
description: Cures Poison. A spraybottle of antitoxin.

name: Apricorn
description: The historical main ingredient for Pokémon capture. Use with a Ball Kit during a Rest to ignore one of the crafted Balls’ ₽ cost.

name: Assault Sleeves
description: Anti-ballistic armor that Boosts the holder's DEF by +10, but they can’t use Status Moves.

name: Assault Vest
description: Anti-projectile armor that Boosts the holder's SDEF by +10, but they can’t use Status Moves.

name: Awakening
description: Cures Sleep. A spraybottle of mint and caffeine.

name: Ball Kit
description: Can craft any type of Poké Ball but Master Ball during Rests by spending 1.5× cost of the Ball. Can't capture new friends without them.

name: Balm Mushroom
description: A rare fungi with a nice fragrance. Roll on the Wild Mushroom table, but reroll on 49 or lower. The holder consumes mushrooms to trigger their effects when their HP drops below 3 Ticks.

name: Baton
description: Used up when the holder switches out, transferring Baton Pass' effects to the replacement.

name: Battle Kit
description: Can craft X-Items during Rests by spending 1.5× cost of the item. A good smoothie always helps.

name: Beast Ball
description: +6 to capture Ultra Beasts, but −6 to capture anything else.

name: Berry Juice
description: Heals 20 HP. Eaten if the holder drops below half HP. 100% pure juice.

name: Berry Kit
description: Can spend 1.5× cost ₽ to craft Berries during a Rest. Mixing seeds during your downtime.

name: Berry Planter
description: A miniature hothouse for gardening on the go. Duplicates 1 berry each Long Rest.

name: Berry Sweet
description: If the holder's HP falls below 3 Ticks, they eat the Sweet to get +3 Critical Rate.

name: Berserk Gene
description: When the holder joins the battle, they get Confused and Boost ATK by +10. A remnant of destructive impulse.

name: Bicycle
description: The fastest way to travel by human power. Every kid wants one. For 2000₽ more, it can inflate its tires to travel over calm water.

name: Big Mushroom
description: A large rare fungi. Roll twice on the Wild Mushroom table. The holder consumes mushrooms to trigger their effects when their HP drops below 3 Ticks.

name: Big Root
description: The holder's Draining Moves and Strength Sap heal twice as much, and Leech Seed/Ingrain/Aqua Ring heals them +1 Tick.

name: Big Treasure
description: Golden Oscars, comet shards, pearl strings… Treasure that’ll make you rich.

name: Binding Band
description: An industrial-strength rubber Möbius strip. The holder's Binding Moves inflict an extra +5 of HP loss between rounds.

name: Binoculars
description: Lets you see practically from one end of a route to the other.

name: Black Belt
description: Pulls tight around the holder to give their Fighting Moves +5 damage.

name: Black Flute
description: Toots a foreboding doot. The next wild Pokémon encountered gets 2 Levels stronger.

name: Black Glasses
description: The holder's Dark Moves get +5 damage. Disguises one’s intentions.

name: Black Sludge
description: Poison-Types holding it heal 1 Tick between rounds, but others lose 1 Tick. A blob of gross goop.

name: Blue Flute
description: Trills a shrill note that awakens a character of your choice.

name: Blunder Policy
description: If the holder misses a Move, they consume Blunder Policy to Boost +10 SPE. Inaccuracy insurance.

name: Bright Powder
description: The holder gets +2 Evasion from its glittery glare.

name: Burn Heal
description: Cures Burn. A spraybottle of aloe and liquid bandage.

name: Calcium
description: Gives +1 to Focus and Persuasion, but does not gain skill bonuses from Level 20. Effect stacks at 1 Level lower until it meets the user's Level.

name: Carbos
description: Gets +1 to Acrobatics and Deception, but does not gain skill bonuses from Level 20. Effect stacks at 1 Level lower until it meets the user's Level.

name: Carrot
description: Restores Accuracy Rate to +0. Can be used as an ingredient for Chef meals.

name: Celery
description: Restores Evasion to +0. Can be used as an ingredient for Chef meals.

name: Cell Battery
description: Used up when the holder is hit by an Electric Move, Boosting ATK by +5. A rechargeable AA.

name: Charcoal
description: The holder's Fire Moves get +5 damage. Cinder used as tinder.

name: Choice Band
description: The holder gets +10 ATK, but can only repeat the first Move they used until they leave the battle. A headband for stubbornness.

name: Choice Scarf
description: The holder gets +10 SPE, but can only repeat the first Move they used until they leave the battle. An accessory to impulse.

name: Choice Specs
description: The holder gets +10 SATK, but can only repeat the first Move they used until they leave the battle. Glasses that cause short-sightedness.

name: Clover Sweet
description: If the holder's HP falls below 3 Ticks, the holder eats the Sweet to get +3 Evasion.

name: Cooking Pot
description: A campfire cauldron where the entire party can participate. During a Rest, each Trainer consumes one berry to restore 3 PP and get +3 Max PP until their next Rest.

name: Dawn Stone
description:
Catches the light like a sudden realization. Can be used up to evolve Eevee, Snorunt♀, or Kirlia♂.
The holder is considered to be on Psychic Terrain.

name: Deep Sea Scale
description:
A faint pink fishscale that can be used up to evolve Clamperl into Gorebyss.
Once per battle, the holder Resists damage that Water would.

name: Deep Sea Tooth
description:
A sharp silver fang that can be used up to evolve Clamperl into Huntail.
Once per battle, the holder may have their Move do Water damage instead.

name: Destiny Knot
description: If a character Infatuates the holder, they also become Infatuated with the holder. A red thread fated to bind lovers.

name: Dire Hit
description: Boosts Critical Rate by +4. Pharmaceutical trademarked as Criticut.

name: Dive Ball
description: +6 to capture Pokémon that live underwater.

name: Dowsing Machine
description: Trainers holding this gain the Pickup Ability. A short-range item finder.

name: Dragon Fang
description: An ancient’s tooth that gives the holder's Dragon Moves +5 damage.

name: Dragon Scale
description:
A thick, unyielding scale that can be used up to evolve Seadra.
Once per battle, the holder may Resist damage that Dragon would.

name: Dream Ball
description: +6 to capture sleeping targets.

name: Dubious Disc
description:
Can be used up to evolve Porygon2. They didn't enhance the user experience enough…
When the holder joins the battle, they get Confused and Boost SATK by +10.

name: Dusk Ball
description: +6 to capture when dark, such as at night or in caves.

name: Dusk Stone
description:
Swallows light that tries to shine through it. Can be used up to evolve Eevee, Misdreavus, Murkrow, Lampent, or Doublade.
The holder is considered to be in Midnight. (Critical Rates for and against the holder get +5.)

name: Dynamax Band
description: Trainers wearing this can Dynamax and Gigantamax their Pokémon. A Wishing Star set into Galarian battle jewelry.

name: Eject Button
description: When a Move damages the holder, they use up the Eject Button to switch out or flee 3 Zones. Press to release a giant spring.

name: Eject Pack
description: If any of the holder’s Stats Drop, they uses up Eject Pack to switch out or flee 3 Zones. Launches at the first sign of trouble.

name: Electric Seed
description: If the field is Electric Terrain, the holder eats Electric Seed to Boost DEF by +5.

name: Electririzer
description:
An electricity-packed device that can be used up to evolve Electabuzz. 
The holder's Electric Moves cost 1 PP less.

name: Elixir
description: Restores 6 PP. The best energy drink money can't buy.

name: Escape Rope
description: A Silph Co. product that looks like a regular rope, but will unwind away from gravity through any holes to the surface. Usually not allowed indoors.

name: Ether
description: Restores 3 PP. The best energy drink money can buy.

name: Eviolite
description: Holders that haven't evolved yet get +5 DEF and SDEF. A mysterious lump that repurposes energy normally spent on evolution.

name: Expert Belt
description: The holder's super-effective Moves get +5 damage. A well-worn token from a battle master.

name: Fast Ball
description: +6 to capture Pokémon with 10 or higher base SPE, and can interrupt fleeing Pokémon for +6 to capture.

name: Fire Stone
description:
Flickers like a burning ember. Can be used up to evolves Vulpix, Growlithe, Pansear, or Eevee.
The holder is considered to be in Harsh Sunlight.

name: Fishing Rod
description: Might hook a wild Pokémon. If it does, oppose its Athletics to reel it in.

name: Flame Orb
description: Burns the holder between rounds. Barely hot enough that it seems fine for a little bit.

name: Flashlight
description: A solar-charged industrial flashlight. Almost never runs out of battery.

name: Float Stone
description: Halves the holder's weight. A pumice pebble much lighter than it looks.

name: Flower Sweet
description: If the holder's HP falls below 3 Ticks, they eat the Sweet to get +3 Effect Range.

name: Focus Band
description: If a damaging Move would Faint the holder, roll d20. On 19+, they endure with 1 HP instead. A headband for determination.

name: Focus Sash
description: If a damaging Move would Faint the holder from 100% HP, they endure with 1 HP instead. A wrap for overwhelming odds.

name: Fossil
description: A stone imprint of ancient species. Bring it to a scientist for restoration into a Pokémon.

name: Fresh Water
description: Heals 30 HP.

name: Friend Ball
description: Pokémon kept in this ball always deal max damage when using Return.

name: Full Heal
description: Cures all Status Problems. A cure-all for common ailments.

name: Full Incense
description: Moves targeting the holder get -1 Priority. Smells like butter.

name: Full Restore
description: Fully heals HP and cures all Status Problems. You get what you pay for.

name: Fuse
description: If the holder is damaged by a Critical Hit and knows Self-Destruct or Explosion, the holder's Move Choice is replaced with Self-Destruct or Explosion (player's choice.)

name: Galarica Loop
description: Can be used up to evolve Galarian Slowpoke to Galarian Slowbro or Slowking (your choice). For other Pokémon, heals 120 HP but moves against the user Can't Miss for the rest of the battle.

name: Gem Kit
description: Can spend 1.5x cost ₽ to craft Type Gems, Evolutionary Stones, and Type Boosters during Rests. Carving out a new hobby.

name: Gondola
description: A basket that holds an entire party. Has harnesses Pokémon can wear to carry the device. A hot-air balloon is 2000₽ extra.

name: Grassy Seed
description: If the field is Grassy Terrain, the holder eats Grassy Seed to Boost DEF by +5.

name: Great Ball
description: +2 to capture.

name: Grip Claw
description: The holder's Binding Moves last 2 rounds longer.

name: Guard Spec.
description: Acts like the Move Mist on the target. Pharmaceutical trademarked as Effect Guard.

name: Hard Stone
description: An unbreakable stone gives the holder's Rock Moves +5 damage.

name: Heal Ball
description: Fully heals the captured Pokémon.

name: Heart Scale
description: A universal symbol of goodwill. Many accept it in exchange for a favor.

name: Heart Stone
description: The holder heals 1 Tick whenever it uses a Move that targets Allies. Recently discovered in Driftveil waters…

name: Heavy Ball
description: +6 to capture Pokémon that weigh 300 lbs or more.

name: Heavy-Duty Boots
description: The holder is immune to Hazards. Thick soles prevent terrain treachery.

name: Hyper Potion
description: Heals 120 HP.

name: Ice Heal
description: Cures Frozen. A spraybottle of brine and char.

name: Ice Stone
description:
Glints like a glacier. Can be used up to evolve Eevee, Crabrawler, Alolan Sandslash, or Alolan Vulpix.
The holder is considered to be in Hail.

name: Iron
description: Gets +1 to Endurance and Bluster, but does not gain skill bonuses from Level 20. Effect stacks at 1 Level lower until it meets the user's Level.

name: Iron Ball
description: Halves the holder’s SPE and grounds them. A heavy black iron sphere.

name: Jolt Orb
description: Paralyzes the holder between rounds. Feels like pleasant tingling at first.

name: Key Stone
description: Trainers wearing this can use Mega Evolution. Battle jewelry from Kalos.

name: King's Rock
description: On 19+, the holder's attacks Flinch the target. A stone radiating a regal aura that can be used up to evolve Slowpoke and Poliwhirl.

name: Lax Incense
description: Moves targeting the holder get -2 Accuracy. Smells musty.

name: Leaf Stone
description:
Always surrounded with fresh air. Can be used up to evolve Gloom, Weepinbell, Exeggcute, Eevee, Nuzleaf, or Pansage.
The holder is considered to be on Grassy Terrain.

name: Leek
description: Doubles Farfetch'd’s Critical Rate when held. A mighty scallion.

name: Leftovers
description: The holder heals 1 Tick between Rounds.

name: Lemonade
description: Heals 70 HP.

name: Level Ball
description: Add the user's Level to the Capture Check and subtract the target's.

name: Life Orb
description: The holder's damaging Moves get +5 damage, but they lose a Tick of HP after using them. Symbolizes pyrrhic victory.

name: Light Ball
description:
Pikachu gets +10 Intensity and Focus when held.
Paralyzes the holder between rounds. Feels like pleasant tingling at first.

name: Light Clay
description: The holder's Reflect, Light Screen, or Aurora Veil lasts 2 rounds longer. Building material for wondrous walls of light.

name: Local Specialty
description: Heals 20 HP and cures all Status Problems. Rage Candy Bars, Lava Cookies, Old Gateaux; everywhere’s got one.

name: Love Ball
description: +6 to capture Pokémon attracted to the Trainer’s active Pokémon.

name: Love Sweet
description: If the holder's HP falls below 3 Ticks, they eat the Sweet and get +3 to Save Bonus.

name: Luck Incense
description: Foes targeting the holder get −2 to Save Bonus. Smells like a new penny.

name: Luminous Moss
description: If the holder is damaged by a Water Move, is used up to Boost SDEF by +5. A green clump that glows when watered.

name: Lure Ball
description: +6 to capture Pokémon that were baited into the encounter.

name: Luxury Ball
description: Pokémon kept in this ball always deal max damage when using Return.

name: Magmarizer
description: A heat-packed device that can be used up to evolve Magmar. The holder’s Fire Moves cost 1 PP less.

name: Magnet
description: A powerful lodestone gives the holder's Electric Moves +5 damage.

name: Magnifying Glass
description: Ghost-Types are not Immune to the holder's Normal or Fighting Moves. Foreseen forensics.

name: Master Ball
description: Always catches a Pokémon without fail.

name: Max Ether
description: Restores all PP.

name: Max Honey
description: Cures Fainting and heals all HP.

name: Max Mushroom
description: Boosts ATK, DEF, SATK, SDEF, and SPE by +5 each. Wild Pokemon might Dynamax by eating these.

name: Max Potion
description: Heals all HP.

name: Max Revive
description: Cures Fainting and heals all HP. A clump of vitality.

name: Medical Kit
description: Can spend 1.5x cost ₽ to craft any non-Berry item that restores HP, PP, or Status during Rests. The best defense is a good bandage.

name: Medium Treasure
description: Gold nuggets, star pieces, big pearls, Amiibo. Treasure that’ll make you smile.

name: Mega Stone
description: Named after a single species (“Beedrillite”, “Dunsparcite”, etc.) Allows a matching holder to Mega Evolve.

name: Mental Herb
description: The holder consumes Mental Herb when inflicted with Infatuation, Taunt, Torment, Encore, or Disable to cure that status.

name: Metal Coat
description: A canister of metallic film that can be used up to evolve Onix and Scyther. The holder's Steel Moves get +5 damage.

name: Metronome
description: If the holder hits with a damaging Move consecutively, that move gets +5 damage each use until another Move is used. Rewards rhythm.

name: Miracle Seed
description: A seed of life force gives the holder’s Grass Moves +5 damage.

name: Misty Seed
description: If the field is Misty Terrain, is eaten by the holder to Boost SDEF by +5.

name: Moomoo Milk
description: Heals 100 HP. Highly nutritious.

name: Moon Ball
description: +6 to capture Pokémon that evolve or evolved with a Moon Stone.

name: Moon Stone
description:
Radiates X-Rays. Can be used up to evolve Nidorina, Nidoking, Jigglypuff, Clefairy, Eevee, Skitty, or Munna.
The holder is considered to be in moonlight.

name: Muscle Band
description: The holder's Physical Moves get +5 damage. A strength-exuding headband.

name: Mystic Water
description: A tear-shaped gem gives the holder's Water Moves +5 damage.

name: Nature Mint
description: Each Mint has a Nature: Hardy, Adamant, etc. Pokémon can eat a Mint to ignore their Nature’s bonus and penalty to their battle stats and get Bonus Stats that affect their battle stats like the Mint’s Nature.

name: Nest Ball
description: +6 to capture if the target is Level 5 or lower.

name: Net Ball
description: +6 to capture if the target is Water- or Bug-Type.

name: Never-Melt Ice
description: A heat-repelling chunk gives the holder's Ice Moves +5 damage.

name: Odd Incense
description: Foes targeting the holder get -2 Critical Rate. Smells like... mimes?

name: Oval Stone
description:
An egg-shaped rock that can be used up to evolve Happini.
The holder gets +2 DEF and -2 ATK.

name: Paralyze Heal
description: Cures Paralysis. A squirtbottle of liniment.

name: Pixie Glitter
description: The holder's Fairy Moves get +5 damage.

name: Poffin
description: Boosts the next social skill check made by the Pokémon who eats it by +5. They don't stack.

name: Poffin Box
description: A baker’s dozen of Poffins. (That’s 13, to be clear.)

name: Poffin Plum
description: Can be used with a Berry Kit during a Rest to make a Poffin for free.

name: Poison Barb
description: The holder's Poison Moves get +5 damage.

name: Poké Ball
description: Throw at a Pokémon to try to capture them.

name: Poké Doll
description: Use to automatically flee from a wild Pokémon, or to decorate.

name: Poké Puff
description: Boosts the next physical skill check made by the Pokémon who eats it by +5.

name: Pokédex
description: A high-tech encyclopedia. Some models are chatty.

name: Portable TV
description: A bit outdated with phones available, but works great for group entertainment.

name: Potion
description: Heals 20 HP. A spraybottle of first-aid ointment.

name: Power Herb
description: The holder consumes Power Herb to skip to the "Next turn" effect of their Move instantly.

name: PP Max
description: Increases Max PP by 1.

name: PP Up
description: Lowers the PP cost of a Move by 1. These do not stack on the same Move.

name: Prism Scale
description:
A beautiful rainbow scale that can be used up to evolve Feebas.
The holder gets +2 to Persuasion checks.

name: Prison Bottle
description: Changes Hoopa’s forme. Persuasion checks fail when within line of sight.

name: Protective Pads
description: The holder ignores effects that trigger on Contact when using Moves on targets. A must for collision sports.

name: Protector
description:
A stiff, heavy brace that can be used up to evolve Rhydon.
The holder gets +5 DEF and SDEF against Super-Effective damage.

name: Protein
description: Gets +1 to Athletics and Intensity, but does not gain skill bonuses from Level 20. Effect stacks at 1 Level lower until it meets the user's Level.

name: Psychic Seed
description: If the field is Psychic Terrain, the holder eats Psychic Seed to Boost SDEF by +5.

name: Pure Incense
description: Foes targeting the holder get −2 Effect Rate. Smells like a fresh breeze.

name: Quick Ball
description: +6 to capture during the first round of a battle.

name: Quick Claw
description: When attacking, roll d20. On 17+, the holder’s Move gets +1 Priority.

name: Raft
description: An inflatable raft that holds an entire party. Has oars and a hitch for Pokémon to tow.

name: Rare Candy
description: A power-packed candy that instantly Levels-Up Pokémon that eat it.

name: Razor Claw
description:
A hooked nail that can be used up at night to evolve Sneasel.
The holder gets +3 Critical Rate.

name: Razor Fang
description:
A ghastly tooth that can be used up at night to evolve Gligar.
On 19+, the holder's attacks Flinch the target.

name: Reaper Cloth
description:
An otherworldy shround that can be used up to evolve Dusclops.
When the holder Faints a target, they heal 2 Ticks.

name: Red Card
description: If a character damages but doesn’t KO the holder, the Red Card is used up to switch out the attacker. Imbued with mysterious sports energy.

name: Red Flute
description: Toots a pessimistic doot, curing a character of your choice of Infatuation.

name: Repeat Ball
description: +6 to capture if the user has owned the target’s species before.

name: Reveal Glass
description: Changes formes for Thundurus, Tornadus and Landorus. A mirror that shows the truth. All Bluster checks fail when within line of sight.

name: Revive
description: Cures Fainting and heals 50% HP. A fragment of vitality.

name: Ribbon Sweet
description: Can be used on a Berry or Sweet to change its trigger to: “hit by a Super-Effective Move.”

name: Ride Pager
description: Calls Ride Pokémon you know the number of to help you out. Expected tip: 500₽.

name: Ring Target
description: Helpfully highlights the holder’s weak points and removes their Type Immunities.

name: Rock Incense
description: Moves targeting the holder cost 1 more PP. Smells like dry dust.

name: Rocky Helmet
description: Whenever an attacker makes contact with the holder, the attacker loses 1 Tick of HP.

name: Room Service
description: In Trick Room, the holder consumes Room Service and drops -5 SPE.

name: Rose Incense
description: Foes targeting the holder get −2 Critical Rate. Smells like a garden in full bloom.

name: Rusted Shield
description: Holding this transforms Zacian into Crowned Sword Forme and Iron Head into Behemoth Bash. For other Pokémon, Boosts +5 ATK when the holder joins the battle.

name: Rusted Sword
description: Holding this transforms Zamazenta into Crowned Shield Forme and Iron Head into Behemoth Blade. For other Pokémon, Boosts +5 DEF when the holder joins the battle.

name: Sachet
description:
A strong-smelling stinkbag that evolves Spritzee.
If held, others making contact make a DC 5 Save or become Confused.

name: Sacred Magatama
description: A bead that brings out benevolence. All Intensity checks fail when within line of sight.

name: Sacred Mirror
description: A mirror that brings true wisdom. All Deception checks fail when within line of sight.

name: Sacred Tsurugi
description: A sword that embodies valor. All Insight checks succeed when within line of sight.

name: Safety Goggles
description: Dustproof eyewear that gives the holder Immunity to Weather damage and Moves with names containing “Powder” or “Spore”.

name: Sand Stone
description: A sedimentary rock. The holder is considered to be in a Sandstorm.

name: Scope Lens
description: Highlights vulnerabilities to give the holder +4 Critical Rate.

name: Sea Incense
description: Moves targeting the holder do −2 less damage. Smells like low tide.

name: Sharp Beak
description: A bird heirloom that gives the holder’s Flying Moves +5 damage.

name: Shed Shell
description: The holder can't be Trapped. A carapace that fits just loosely enough.

name: Shell Bell
description: The holder heals 10% of the damage their Moves deal. Life’s a beach.

name: Shiny Stone
description:
Glimmers with a dazzle. Use it up to evolve Roselia, Togetic, Minccino, or Floette.
The holder is considered to be on Misty Terrain.

name: Short Straw
description: Redirects all Moves this round to the user's Pokemon.

name: Signature Z-Crystal
description: In addition to typical Z-Crystal use, lets the holder use Z-Moves exclusive to their species.

name: Silk Scarf
description: The holder's Normal Moves get +5 damage. Plain looks good on some.

name: Silver Powder
description: The holder's Bug Moves get +5 damage. A shiny pile of… chitin?

name: Small Treasure
description: Gold leaves, stardust, beach glass. Treasure that’ll buy you a meal.

name: Smoke Ball
description: The holder can always flee from wild Pokémon successfully without a check. A reusable ninja tool.

name: Snowball
description: If the holder takes Ice damage, they consume the Snowball to Boost ATK by +5.

name: Soda Pop
description: Heals 50 HP. “Psycho Soda!”

name: Soft Sand
description: The holder's Ground Moves get +5 damage.

name: Spell Tag
description: The holder's Ghost Moves get +5 damage.

name: Star Sweet
description: If the holder's HP falls below 3 Ticks, they eat the Sweet to get +3 Accuracy.

name: Sticky Barb
description: The holder loses 1 Tick of HP between rounds. Transfers to others when they make Contact with the holder.

name: Strawberry Sweet
description: Can be used on a Berry or Sweet to change its trigger to: HP below 5 Ticks.

name: Style Kit
description: Can spend 1.5× cost ₽ to craft any Held Item not consumed upon use during Rests. There's always time for fashion.

name: Sun Stone
description:
Glows like the midday sky. Evolves Gloom, Sunkern, Cottonee, Petilil, and Helioptile.
The holder ignores the effects of weather.

name: Super Potion
description: Heals 60 HP.

name: Sweet Apple
description: Evolves Applin into Appletun. Other Pokémon can consume it outside of battle to Boost +5 Deception.

name: Tart Apple
description: Evolves Applin into Flapple. Other Pokémon can consume it outside of battle to Boost +5 Bluster.

name: Technical Kit
description: Can spend 1.5× cost ₽ to craft Technical Machines and Technical Records during Rests, if a Pokémon the Trainer owns knows the Move. Share our knowledge through technology.

name: Technical Machine
description: Teaches a Pokemon a Move. Is not destroyed upon use. Cost $4× (500 + (500× PP Cost)) to buy from a standard vendor.

name: Technical Record
description: Teaches a Pokemon a Move. Destroyed upon use. Cost $500 + (500×PP Cost) to buy from a standard vendor.

name: Tent
description: A shelter for sleeping outdoors. Can be used up to gain the benefits of a Long Rest during a Short Rest.

name: Terrain Extender
description: The holder’s special Terrains last 2 rounds longer. Primer for the battlefield.

name: Thick Club
description: Marowak gets +10 ATK when holding this.

name: Throat Spray
description: After the holder uses a Sonic Move, they consume Throat Spray to Boost SATK by +5.

name: Thunder Stone
description:
Pulses with crackling sparks. Use it up to evolve Pikachu, Magneton, Eevee, Nosepass, Eelektrik, or Charjabug.
The holder is considered to be on Electric Terrain.

name: Timer Ball
description: +6 to capture if the battle has lasted 5 rounds or longer.

name: Tiny Mushroom
description: Eat to roll on the Wild Mushroom table.

name: Toxic Orb
description: Badly poisons the holder between rounds.

name: Twisted Spoon
description: The holder's Psychic Moves get +5 damage.

name: Type Drive
description: Changes Techno Blast to the Drive’s Type when held. Acts as a Technical Record for any Move matching the Drive's Type.

name: Type Gem
description: The holder uses up the Gem when using a damaging Move of the Gem’s Type to get +10 damage.

name: Type Memory
description: Activates RKS System and changes Multi-Attack's Type to the Memory's Type. Acts as a Technical Record for any Move matching the Memory's Type.

name: U-Pipe
description: Whenever a character hits the holder with a Ranged Move, they lose 1 Tick of HP.

name: Ultra Ball
description: +4 to capture.

name: Up-Grade
description:
Minor adjustments to enhance the user experience, evolving Porygon.
The holder gets +1 to each Stat.

name: Utility Umbrella
description: Foes targeting the holder do not get the extra +10 damage from weather.

name: Water Stone
description:
Sparkles like a sunlit stream. Use it up to evolve Poliwhirl, Staryu, Shellder, Eevee, Lombre, or Panpour.
The holder is considered to be in Rain.

name: Wave Incense
description: Moves targeting the holder do −2 damage. Smells like high tide.

name: Weakness Policy
description: If the holder is damaged Super-Effectively, they use up the Weakness Policy to Boost ATK and SATK by +10 each.

name: Weathered Rock
description: When the holder changes the weather, it lasts 2 rounds longer.

name: Weathered Scarf
description: Makes the Trainer immune to damage from Sandstorm and Hail.

name: Whipped Dream
description:
A cloyingly-sweet treat can be used up to evolve Swirlix.
If the holder makes contact with a foe, the foe makes a DC 6 Save or they must target the holder as if Follow Me had been used.

name: White Flute
description: Toots a merry doot. The next wild Pokémon encountered becomes 2 Levels weaker.

name: White Herb
description: If one of the holder's Stats is Dropped below its default, they consume the White Herb to restore all Drops.

name: Wide Lens
description: The holder gets +2 Accuracy.

name: Wise Glasses
description: The holder’s Special Moves get +5 bonus damage.

name: X Accuracy
description: Boosts Accuracy by +4. Pharmaceutical trademarked as Hits Well.

name: X Attack
description: Boosts ATK by +10. Pharmaceutical trademarked as PlusPower.

name: X Defend
description: Boosts DEF by +10. Pharmaceutical trademarked as Defender.

name: X Sp. Atk
description: Boosts SATK by +10. Pharmaceutical trademarked as Special Up.

name: X Sp. Def
description: Boosts SDEF by +10. Pharmaceutical trademarked as Special Guard.

name: X Speed
description: Boosts SPE by +10. Pharmaceutical trademarked as Speeder.

name: Yellow Flute
description: A clear tone cures a character of your choice of Confusion.

name: Z-Crystal
description: The holder can use Z-Moves matching the Z-Crystal’s type.

name: Z-Ring
description: Trainers wearing this can activate Z-Moves.

name: Zinc
description: Gets +1 to Stealth and Insight, but does not gain skill bonuses from Level 20. Effect stacks at 1 Level lower until it meets the user's Level.

name: Zoom Lens
description: The holder gets +4 Accuracy targeting characters who already acted this Round.
